Articles.Content:
Squad feel no rush in implementing anything I suggest, I love your game too much, but there are some things I would be pleased to see:

A more efficient method of rotating Kerbals in orbital EVA, as it can get trick when the Kerbal and target pod/ladder are inclined.

It would be nice if a Sub assembly like function were added, or maybe even just folders to store craft, just like the map has different categories. In my .18-.20 world, I had well over 100 craft, and while I could have removed unnecessary ones, it still would be nice to have landers, rovers, and station parts in their own locations for easy launch and editing.

As of .21, I have trouble re-focusing on my craft one I switch my map camera focus on Kerbin. I think it would be great if there was greater clarification with the functions of single, double, and triple clicking, although I do like the new "Set as target" and "Switch to" options.

If re-entry damage were to be implemented, there could be a damage percent or meter, but I'm just throwing that out on a limb.

I know we all would love more part and kerbal animations. As a side note, the flag planting animation is really cool.

Thank you so much Squad, I love this game and don't feel in a rush to make another update, the reset on .21 will give me plenty of things to do, and could not have come at a better time, I was running out of things to do in the Kerbin system. (I don't venture far from home)

o recently with something from Maxmaps suggesting sub-assembly functionality should be in 0.22, go to about 9:40 in the video
